author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: وقتی که شمس اسم مؤثّرم بر کلّ اشیاء تجلّی فرموده در هر شیء اثر و ثمری علی قدر مقدور ظاهر چنانچه ملاحظه میشود که سمّ
translation: To transgress the limits of one’s own rank and station is, in no wise, permissible. The integrity of every rank and station must needs be preserved. By this is meant that every created thing should be viewed in the light of the station it hath been ordained to occupy.
